item.title: Say hello to Hyas üëã
item.description: Demo hyas.netlify.app Why Some website projects require a solid starting point. With a great developer experience and a sound user experience. Sometimes you just don’t want to start from scratch. That’s why I created Hyas üíö How Making use of the power of Hugo. Following best practices for performance, SEO and security. Optimized for the Netlify platform. And always flexible, so you can easily make it your own. What The Hyas goodness:

item.title: Doks
item.description: Demo doks.netlify.app Features Solid base Get all the Hyas goodness: Security aware Fast by default ‚ö°Ô∏è SEO-ready Development tools (linting, cleaning) Bootstrap framework ‚Äî v5.x Netlify-ready (functions, redirects, headers) Nice extras Full text search ‚Äî using FlexSearch üöÄ Page layouts (landing page, blog, documentation layout) Dark mode ‚Äî switch to a low-light UI with the click of a button Great scores 100 scores on Google Lighthouse A+ scores on Mozilla Observatory
